title: Handle a Derailment Incident
description: A train has derailed. A control center manager must coordinate the emergency response.

tasks.description: Receive an emergency call from a crew reporting a derailment.
tasks.expected_outcome: A critical incident case is opened.

tasks.description: Notify external emergency services (fire, police) and internal company leadership.
Stop all other train traffic in the vicinity of the derailment.
tasks.expected_outcome: The area is secured from other train movements.

tasks.description: Dispatch a hazardous materials team if the derailed cars contain dangerous goods.
tasks.expected_outcome: A specialized team is dispatched if required.
